description:
Kurusu Kurogo is an upbeat high school boy with passion for kabuki. He is simple-minded and straightforward. It is unknown what happened to his parents, since he lives with his aunt Saiko, a mangaka who is often rushing to meet deadlines, leaving Kurusu to take care of himself. He is noted to be short of height and having a baby face. However, his love for kabuki is unparalleled. He is the president and director of his school`s kabuki club.
Source: English Wikipedia
name: Kurusu Kurogo
